Instruction: Place lemon zest and vodka in an airtight container, ensuring all ingredients are fully combined. Seal the container and store it in a cool, dark area. Remember to shake the container every day to blend the lemon zest with the vodka for 5 days.

Infuse lemon zest with vodka in a sealed container. Allow to sit in a cool, dark place, shaking daily for 5 days. Strain the vodka mixture and combine with milk and sugar in a pot. Heat and stir until sugar dissolves, then cool. Strain into a bottle and chill for 1 hour before serving cold.
